title: Main export partners of Iran 2017
summary: This chart shows the Main export Country Iran the Share of total that occured .

The Country with the Main Share of total is Italy with only 5.3 followed by Japan with 5.3 , China with 27.5 , South_Korea with 11.4 , Turkey with 11.1 and the most popular being India with 27.5 total .
gold: This statistic shows Iran 's main export partners in 2017 , sorted by their share in total exports . In 2017 , Iran 's main export partner was China with a share of 27.5 percent in all exports .
